overview:
## Discussion

Use this property for additional data as may be appropriate for your app—for example, a shopping cart identifier or an order number.

The signed payment data (the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken/paymentData] property of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken]) includes a hash of this data. You’re responsible for sending the full application data to your server, if needed.

# applicationData

**Instance Property**

Application-specific data or state you can add to support your app.

## Declaration

```swift
DOMString applicationData;
```

## Discussion

Use this property for additional data as may be appropriate for your app—for example, a shopping cart identifier or an order number.

The signed payment data (the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken/paymentData] property of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentToken]) includes a hash of this data. You’re responsible for sending the full application data to your server, if needed.
title: applicationData
